column4: hi, I've just updated my kernel for my edgy distro to 2.6.17-12 and I'm having problems with my ipw3945 interface
anyone else experienced problems with the ipw3945?
basically it seems to associate with the AP fine but then as traffic starts to pass through the interface it de-associates (if there is such a word ;)
| I try on search in my ubuntu, there's no such thing like ipw3945?
